resources.string: Welcome, Here you login to your own personal account so that you would be able to reserve your daily meals. God bless.
Egypt\'s Giza Pyramids and the Sphinx

This application is part of a final year engineering graduation project. It practically lets you reserve your daily meal, or even cancel it. The whole idea is to ease the order and cancel for our students, instead of them being forced to be there physically to be able to do that, the application enables them to order through the Internet.
By clicking this button you reserve your meal.
Please note that you have a specific time to order, it\'s being decided by the administration of the restaurant.
By clicking this button you cancel your reservation.
Please note that you have a specific time in which you can cancel your reservation.
An image containing text. Don\'t forget to have a good time.
The Username or Password you entered is not correct!
